short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle various screen modes for better visual comfort.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Eye Protector: Screen Filter Modes" is a Chrome extension designed to help users reduce eye strain while using their screens. With various customisation screen filters, including Black and White, Yellow Eye Protection, Blue Light Filter, and Invert Mode, this extension allows you to adjust your screenâ€™s appearance based on your needs. Easily toggle between different modes with a user-friendly interface that remembers your last selection, ensuring a comfortable viewing experience across all your web browsing activities.
